alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 16 at 3:02PM CST until February 16 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 302 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Booneville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Booneville, Iuka, Burnsville, Thrashers, Midway, Leedy, Burton, Paden, Bacon Springs, Oldham, Blythe Crossing, Gaston, Carter Branch, Hazard Switch, Holcut, Holts Spur, Altitude, Walker Siding and Petertown. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
